short_description: john parker fixings is a glaziers & glass products supplier based in ipswich, united kingdom.
long_description: we are a third generation family run business. we make the whole process easy, affordable and effortless. john parker fixings is a three generation family run business and has been established for over 40 years. started in 1984 by father & son-john & clive parker, john parker fixings is a true family business with their wives gail and laura providing admin and accounts support. due to its longevity, john parker fixings has a wealth of experience in the industry and the company has grown and expanded to cover all aspects of home improvements within east anglia. we offer a friendly, personal, high quality service to all our customers and our installations are covered by a homepro ten year insurance backed guarantee giving you the confidence that we really are a company you can trust. we have low budget options, mid range, or high end products including triple glazing. we provide these services for the people of ipswich, suffolk, east anglia. established by john & clive parker and trading since 1984.

long_description: john parker fixings is a family run business that has been trading for over 35 years started by father and son, john and clive, in 1983. we have a trade counter supplying upvc roofline, & rainwater products plus associated fixings to both the trade and the public. we also supply upvc double & triple glazing, polycarbonate, conservatories and carports. we also offer an installation service for all of our products. our experienced installers are fensa registered and are employed by john parker fixings where as many companies in this industry use self employed sub-contractors. this way we guarantee an excellent standard of installation. if you require further information do not hesitate to contact us or pop in to our depot in ipswich.
